This project contains the code and report for the [Kaggle Histopathological Cancer Detection
Competition](https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/histopathologic-cancer-detection).

Python code to build models is in `week_3.py`

Bash script to run this code for all models is in: `./run_models.sh`

Results are here: [CNN Cancer Detection Kaggle Mini-Project](http://www.andrewdsimms.com/kaggle_histopathological_cancer_detection/)
